channel.title: Bearshare or limewire or 360share pro ! help
channel.description:
right i need help with all these
bearshare i download a song and i cant use it coz the files are coruped
limewire i can not open on the desktop
360share pro same as limewire i can not open on desktop
can u help me plz i give u rep!!

item.title: Bearshare or limewire or 360share pro ! help
item.dc:creator: @g00dg0d g00dg0d
item.description:
@g00dg0d wrote:

Follow what everone says. They arnt telling you to go look what you downloaded. Delete the stuff for limewire and re install it.

Read full topic
item.source: Bearshare or limewire or 360share pro ! help

item.title: Bearshare or limewire or 360share pro ! help
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

bobbymoore64:

no i want to open it so i can download not to look in wot music i downloaed

Then follow what he said, uninstall it?

We can’t spoon feed you, first you need to learn how to help yourself.

Read full topic
item.source: Bearshare or limewire or 360share pro ! help

item.title: Bearshare or limewire or 360share pro ! help
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

C:\Documents and Settings*Usernamehere*\Shared

That’s for Limewire. I’ll simplify it for you though.
Go to start menu, search, type in shared. Look for your shared folder.

Read full topic
item.source: Bearshare or limewire or 360share pro ! help

item.title: Bearshare or limewire or 360share pro ! help
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

I know.

BloodRayne:

Uninstall it, delete the rest of the files from program files > LimeWire, then reinstall it and it should work and you will still have all your music and stuffs.

Read full topic
item.source: Bearshare or limewire or 360share pro ! help
